mathematics.title: Single Variable Calculus
mathematics.description: Introduction to limits, derivatives, and integrals of single-variable functions.

mathematics.title: Application of Single & Several Variable Calculus
mathematics.description: Covers advanced applications of calculus including multivariable functions.

mathematics.title: Linear Algebra
mathematics.description: Fundamentals of linear algebra and matrix operations.

mathematics.title: Ordinary Differential Equations
mathematics.description: Study of first and second order differential equations and their applications.

mathematics.title: Complex Variables
mathematics.description: Introduction to complex functions and analysis techniques.

mathematics.title: Partial Differential Equations
mathematics.description: Study of classical partial differential equations and methods of solving them.

mathematics.title: Probability and Statistics
mathematics.description: Covers probability theory, random variables, and statistical inference.

computerScience.title: Data Structure and Algorithms
computerScience.description: Fundamental course on designing and analyzing algorithms and data structures.

computerScience.title: Algorithms-II
computerScience.description: Continuation of algorithms focusing on advanced techniques and complexity.

computerScience.title: Principles of Database Systems
computerScience.description: Introduction to database design, SQL, and transaction management.

computerScience.title: Computer Networks
computerScience.description: Introduction to principles of computer networks and protocols.

machineLearning.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
machineLearning.description: Core ML course covering supervised and unsupervised learning.
machineLearning.project: Implemented a classification model comparing SVMs and Neural Networks.

machineLearning.title: Fundamentals of Data Science and Machine Intelligence
machineLearning.description: Course introducing data science methods and intelligent algorithms.
machineLearning.project: Built a predictive analytics model on large datasets.

electricalEngineering.title: Signals, Systems and Networks
electricalEngineering.description: Introduction to signals, system analysis, and electrical networks.

electricalEngineering.title: Analog Electronics
electricalEngineering.description: Study of analog electronic devices and microelectronics.

electricalEngineering.title: Control Systems Analysis
electricalEngineering.description: Course on modeling and analyzing control systems.

electricalEngineering.title: Principles of Communications
electricalEngineering.description: Covers principles of analog and digital communication systems.

electricalEngineering.title: Digital Electronics
electricalEngineering.description: Study of logic gates, combinational and sequential circuits.

electricalEngineering.title: Communication Systems
electricalEngineering.description: Extension of principles of communication with focus on digital methods.
